parameters: "What's wrong, Sakura, do you know this place?"\n<Yukine>\F[5]\AA[F]\FF[22]

"This mark on the pillar, I made it on my
birthday."\n<Shuo>\FF[40]

"Really, the mark is still there... Let's
investigate a little."\n<Yukine>\F[5]\AA[F]\FF[40]
"There should only be clothes in there."\n<Shuo>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[22]

"Why do you know what's inside... Ah, right. You
know because it's Saku's room."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[22]

"There's a letter inside... It's amazing it's
remained so clean."\n<Yukine>\F[5]

Saku, we cannot ask for your forgiveness for
sending you to the mountain. Tonight, we were
unable to protect you. We have never forgotten the
happiness of the day you were born, not even for a
single day, and the precious memories of that
day...

We have sullied our duty. You, who were sent to
the gods, will likely never lay eyes on this
letter of repentance. Nevertheless, we leave
behind this final letter.

You brought us happiness, yet we deeply regret
betraying that.

Therefore, before you reach the presence of the
gods, as a samurai who could not even protect his
own child, and as his wife bearing the sin and
responsibility of child murder, we will take our
lives and become spirits to join you, along with
Lord Kageyoshi.

Saku, we love you from the bottom of our hearts.
We're sorry we couldn't make you happy...

"Both of them had passed away before the mansion
was consumed by the curse. That's why... they
didn't become evil spirits."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"It's okay... It's okay to cry when you're sad."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[23]

\F[1](She's still sad... But she can say she's okay.
Even though she's been sealed away for so long...
Saku is truly a strong child.)\AA[F]\FF[41]

(The red comb in hand seems to emanate Saku's aura
and the gentle power of prayers. Could it be the
only keepsake left by her mother?)\FF[22]\F[5]\AA[N]

"This belongs to you, Saku... I want you to use
it."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[24]

(There are marks left on the pillar. This era is,
let's see...)\F[5]

(Huh? Could it be that Saku is actually much older
than me?)\F[7]

"Saku... I'm still okay to be your Onee-san,
right?"\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[22]

"It seems like she has something she wants to
say."\n<Yukine>\F[5]
